articles.title: Man Utd boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer could sell three Sir Alex Ferguson favourites in summer - Express.co.uk
articles.description: Manchester United boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer could offload the final servants of Sir Alex Ferguson's reign.
articles.content: This summer is sure to be an important phase in Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s Manchester United rebuild. The Red Devils are keen to make a splash when the transfer window reopens, with the likes of Jadon Sancho, Jack Grealish and Jude Bellingham all on their radar. … [+1649 chars]

articles.description: Wayne Rooney holds a record at Man Utd that he doesn't expect to be beaten for a long time, which could serve as a challenge to the current squad.

articles.description: The Colombian is again being linked with a switch to the Premier League and seems certain to leave Real Madrid on a permanent deal this summer
